original_title: Joelma: Avante - Ao Vivo em São Paulo
overview: "Avante" is the first live album of the solo career of Brazilian music artist Joelma, released on April 28, 2017 through Universal Music. The show was recorded on November 9, 2016 at  "Coração Sertanejo", in São Paulo. This is the record of the Avante Tour, made in support of her solo debut album "Joelma" (2016). For the record, Joelma invited the singers Ivete Sangalo and Solange Almeida, as well as her children Natália Sarraff, Yago Mendes and Yasmin Mendes.
title: Avante - Ao Vivo em São Paulo
